Name: Project Hunter
About the game: Stealth and tactic game that give you the control of an alien that evolves, acquire new abilities and face levels in various ways. Control An Alien That Eats Humans. Sneak Up and Murder Your Enemies Brutally. Evolve to become the apex predator of your environment. Add new skills to your set that Will allow you to Hunt and advance in various ways. Survive in a hostile environment. Abilities You will have different abilities depending on your evolve stage Dash : this ability will make you able to do a fast move forward, so you can evade your enemies easier. Spit : this ability will make you able to mislead your enemies to the place you want. Invisible : this ability will make you invisible for a limited time, but be careful you may be detected by some enemy security items! And more abilities that you will learn along the way ! Remember to Add Us to Your Wishlist!
